description: This seminar offers in-depth reading, writing, and discussion on a selected topic from areas common to sociology and anthropology with an emphasis on contemporary analysis and ethics. Specific content will vary from year to year. Offered annually in the spring semester. Prerequisite: open to senior sociology/anthropology majors only.
name: Senior Seminar
notes: Prerequisite: Completion of BTS-T or permission of instructor. Open to senior Sociology/Anthropology majors only.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: open to senior sociology/anthropology majors only.
